other_tests.findings: Multiple hypodense lesions throughout the liver, with the largest being 2.1 cm x 2.7 cm likely secondary to biliary hamartomas; large abscess in the deep right pelvis measuring 8.9 cm x 8.1 cm by 8.9 cm; ascending colon shows mild thickening consistent with colitis; inflammatory changes surrounding the abscess.
Cloudy, purulent appearing fluid was drained; mixed bacterial flora was identified.
